articles.title: Symposiums held on 5th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's demise
Withdrawal of  policy on combined use of foreign languages urged
10-day film show opens
articles.content:
10-day film show opens
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A 10-day film show opened on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the president Kim Il Sung's demise.   During the period films showing president Kim Il Sung's great revolutionary history and immortal exploits will be screened throughout the country.   Documentary film "Paternal Leader With Workers" and other films showing the President's seasoned leadership and noble popular traits will be shown.   Also showing will be "Star of Korea", "the Sun of the Nation" and other feature films on his revolutionary history and films on indefatigable revolutionary activities of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.   An opening ceremony for the 10-day film show took place at the People's Palace of culture yesterday.
   Inaugural meetings were held also in all provinces yesterday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on U.S. trade pressure upon  S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on U.S. trade pressure upon  S. Korea
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The United States is now putting trade pressure upon South Korea, under its trade act "Super 301."   Commenting on it, Rodong Sinmun today says:   The U.S. invokes its own act, not troubleshooting procedures of the World Trade Organization, to take unilateral retaliatory actions against the opposite party. This is a totally gangster-like and dominationist act.   Nevertheless, the South Korean rulers are accepting most of such robbery actions of their master United States, without any protest.   It is shame and inevitable fate of a colonial slave that South Korea has become a victim to the U.S. trade act.   
   This is not the first time for South Korea to suffer losses under this act. In recent years the U.S. obtained profits by invoking the act against South Korea in different fields such as communications equipment and motors.   South Korea, now under the trusteeship of the International Monetary Fund, is being driven into a tighter corner by "Super 301" of the United States, which seeks to grow fat on double and treble plunder. There is no limit to the U.S. plunder.
   The only way for South Korea to escape from the piteous plight of a colonial slave is to terminate the colonial fascist rule of the U.S. and the traitors and achieve independence and reunification.

articles.title: Preparatory committee formed
articles.content:
Preparatory committee formed
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The north preparatory committee for the grand pan-national festival for reunification was formed here on July 1 to host the '99 Grand Pro-Reunification Festival and the 10th Pan-National Rally for Independence and Great Unity of the Nation on August 15 this year.    The committee consists of 15 persons. Its chairman is An Kyong ho, director of the secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland and vice-chairman of the north headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification.
   The committee will promote the work to hold with success the August 15, 1999 Grand Pan-National Festival for Reunification as a grand festival common to the nation, keeping in  touch with the south and overseas sides preparatory committees.

articles.title: Photo exhibition and film show in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Photo exhibition and film show in Pyongyang 
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition and a film show took place at the Pyongyang Textile Combine on July 1 under the sponsorship of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee in the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.   Present on invitation were Cuban ambassador to Korea Jose Manuel Inclan Embade and embassy officials.
   Present were Ri Jin Su, vice-chairman of the central committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and vice-chairman of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee, officials concerned and employees of the combine.
   The participants went round photos introducing the Cuban people who are firmly defending socialism in face of blockade of the imperialists and then saw a Cuban feature film.

articles.title: Agreement of 38th meeting of Korea-China  committee signed
articles.content:
Agreement of 38th meeting of Korea-China  committee signed
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- An agreement on the matters discussed at the 38th Korea-China border river navigation cooperation committee meeting in Pyongyang was signed Thursday.

articles.title: Air espionage on DPRK in June
articles.content:
Air espionage on DPRK in June
   Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. war hawks carried out air espionage on the North Korea  with strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes of various missions on more than 150 occasions in the previous month, military sources said.   On June 30, Japan-based "RC-135" strategic reconnaissance plane photographed the overall area of the north and overseas-based "E-3" AWACS committed espionage on the in-depth area of the north.   On June 29,  "U-2"  high-altitude strategic reconnaissance plane flew in the sky above the area along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) to commit espionage on the north's strategic objects.

Credentials  from new Sudanese ambassador to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Credentials  from new Sudanese ambassador to Kim Yong Nam
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Abdel Hameed Abdeen Mohammad, new Sudanese Ambassador E.P. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.   Vice foreign minister Pak Kil Yon was present there.   The president had a talk with the ambassador after receiving credentials.
